title: Trump's Tax Plan: A Closer Look | Jeff Garlin | Jesmyn Ward
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how President Trump is outright lying about the fate of his health care bill and his new tax plan.
Then, he speaks with Jeff Garlin and author Jesmyn Ward, both of whom continue the conversation backstage at Studio 8G.
